authors: Dorean K. Collins Is A Native Of Washington
Graduate Of Smith College. While At Smith She Studied Portuguese Brazilian Studies
Sociology. Dorean Is Currently A Nbcuniversal Page With The Digital Diversity Editorials Team.
title: Disney's 'A Wrinkle In Time' Trailer Sparkles With Black Girl Magic

og.title: Ava DuVernay's 'A Wrinkle In Time' trailer sparkles with #BlackGirlMagic
og.description: In March 2018, movie go-ers will be transported to planets that defy the social structure of our world with Ava DuVernay's adaption of "A Wrinkle In Time."
